WidgetInfo.Description: Produces a printable version of the page
WidgetInfo.Label: Print

Parameter.Name: ShowPrintUI
Parameter.Description: Show the print dialog to allow configuration before printing
Parameter.Label: Show print dialog

Parameter.Name: ShowTitle
Parameter.Description: Show the title on the page
Parameter.Label: Show title

Parameter.Name: ShowLegend
Parameter.Description: Show the legend on the page
Parameter.Label: Show legend

Parameter.Name: ShowNorthArrow
Parameter.Description: Show the north arrow on the page
Parameter.Label: Show north arrow
